      • login

        public Proto.LoginResponse login(java.lang.String serverAddress,
                        java.lang.String username)
        Logs-in to the server.
        Parameters:
        serverAddress - The full address of the server. This is the dirname of the URL of all requests.
        username - The username of the local user.

      • seek

        public Proto.SeekResponse seek(GameEventHandler handler)
        Seeks a new game.
        Parameters:
        handler - An event handler that will be invoked with each game event in the new game.
        Returns:
        The response of the seek request.
